body.name: Microwave Oven Rack, Expandable Microwave Stand Countertop Kitchen Utensils Tableware Storage, Carbon Steel Over Microwave Shelf Countertop 3 Tier with 3 Hooks
features: NOTE: IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE STABILITY OF MICROWAVE STAND, PLS DO NOT EXPANDE THE LENGTH OVER 23.6 INCHES. Expandable Microwave Counter Stand: The length of this microwave shelf stand can be adjusted from 15.7" to 23.6" (40cm to 60 cm) according your needs. You can adjust the size to store a microwave oven and other kitchen untensils to help you save more kitchen space.

Easy to Install: Comes with install tools and instruction, it will be easy for you to install this 3 tier microwave oven rack shelf, just follow the instruction and adjusted it to the right length and height, no drilling needed! We use non-slip suction feet to prevent the microwave stand countertop from sliding the table.

Strong & Sturdy Construction: DOLALIKE microwave shelf rack is made of carbon steel, which each tier can holds up to 55LBS, total can holds up to 110LBS, rugged and durable, it can store microwaves and other kitchen items such as Bottles, Cans, Bowls, Plates, Pans, Soup pots, Etc. It‘s a nice and perfect kitchen supplies.

Kitchen Space Saving Helper: Say goodbye to the chaos kitchen area! With the help of over microwave shelf, you can tidy your kitchen tools up on the shelf and save a lot of space for cooking, make your kitchen clean and neat; also save your time to cooking food.

Wide Application: This adjustable microwave shelf is perfect for kitchen use, and also suitable for shower room, living room, wardaobe as a storage shelf. It comes with 3 bonus hooks for you to hang kitchen utensils like shovel, towels, pot spoon.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Anti-slip Design four anti-skid pads to maintain stability and prevent scratches on the countertop. Stretch left and right The adjustable width is between 15.74"-23.62". Just rotate the tube lock up\loose. Easy installation Use the installation tool Allen wrench to tighten the screws for easy installation.

Are you still agitated about how to solve the messy kitchen? Why don't you try our microwave oven rack? The benefits of choosing our products: DOLALIKE Microwave Oven Rack Toaster Stand Shelf Expandable Kitchen Supplies Tableware Storage Counter Space Saver Cabinet Organizer Spice Holder with 3 Hooks Double-layer storage, say goodbye to messy countertop, and enhanced storage capacity, saving kitchen space. Triangular mechanical structure, stronger load-bearing, avoid shaking the shelf, more stable. Free removable stainless steel hook, hanging kitchen utensils such as spatula, colander, eggbeater, etc. Curved edge design, the surface is smooth and easy to clean, no cut hands, comfortable touch. Carbon steel material, paint process, high temperature resistance, no rust，long lasting durability and safety. Retractable design, easy to adjust, just adjust the bracket to adapt to different sizes of microwave ovens, providing additional storage space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This rack is just what I needed to clean up my kitchen. Now I can neatly organize my things. The microwave, toaster oven and my bottle water and snacks all fit together like a glove. Now my kitchen looks better like this. It's a little bit tricky to assemble, but take your time and follow the photos and instructions. Took me about 30 minutes to put it together. It was worth it. It's nice and sturdy, good quality and looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A sturdy space-saver!
reviews.reviewText: This was a great shelving unit to add to the kitchen in my small studio apartment. Arrived as advertised. It was easy to assemble and will be easy to adjust to fit the unique dimensions of my space. Both the multiple shelf level settings, as well as the expandable length seem sturdy and simple to change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: It was so hard for me to put together because it was hard to tell which direction to use the items so it was lots of trial and error but once assembled were we smooth sailing. I love it and it works well in my tiny kitchen to maximize space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shelf was fairly easy to assemble & rather sturdy. The instructions are clear. Length is adjustable. A bit heavy when completely assembled. The only problem is, per parta list, missing a few screws. Couldn't complete assembling the shelf as instructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and strong. Fits my needs perfectly. Love that you can adjust length as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver.
reviews.reviewText: Tiny apartment living, this shelf helps tremendously. The nice part is the ability to make it wider, however, the wider it gets the more it dips in the middle. But definitely would recommend to those who need a small shelving for little space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: IT IS NOT STRONG VERY LIGHT AND THIN CAN"T HOLD MUCH OTHER THEN SUPER LIGHT STUFFS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I assembled by myself just fine.
reviews.reviewText: This fit perfectly where I needed it. I really like it. It is sturdy. If one follows the instructions it is easy, especially if you do as it says and wait to tighten down the screws until after you get it assembled! I like that I built it myself with no help.There is only 2 things I would change and that is that the screws are silver and the shelf is black. The second is the little non-slip tubes are too flexible and do not want to stay on. Are those 2 things deal breakers? Absolutely NOT! Both are fixable if I choose to use black nail polish to cover the silver and use some stiffer tubing that I happen to have on hand from medical supplies. Both are easy fixes for a great shelf that gives me more storage space in my super tiny kitchen! My small convection oven sits on top of my microwave and this fit perfectly on top of the microwave and over the oven so that I can store food covers for my microwave, utensils, convection racks and silicone hot pads! Would I buy again? Yes! I just might have one more place that one would work in!Oh and my 2 cutting boards fit perfectly too. Yep, I am very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a excellent product but...
reviews.reviewText: There was no paper instructions included. I had to use the picture as reference and use the video on how to put it together. After assembling the over microwave shelf, it came out quite sturdy. I adjusted the shelves for how I want it to fit with kitchen supplies to have more counter space. I'm quite happy with the product, it was just a bit of a challenge to put it together without accidently damaging it (only cosmetic level). My family loves it as well for having more space without buying a whole new piece of furniture.
Nice addition to any kitchen. Can support the weight of most appliances.

Primero, creo que en la parte superior también debería tener algún tipo de tope hacia atrás, porque las cosas que pones ahí se podrían caer y segundo comprendo el porque los postes tienen varios orificios pero sabiendo que algunos no se utilizarán deberían mandar con que poder taparlos, en lo personal no me gusta como se ven así sin nada. De ahí en más me gustó

I would get some fire retardant foam with an adhesive side to go on the top shelf, should you intend to put an air fryer on the second rack as I did. I would also get a heatproof mat to put things on, so your smoke detector does not go off :D. Takes a bit of doing to make everything fit. I had to change the way the shelf braces were mounted, but it works fine, and doesn't show (so it could handle the depth of the air fryer).I will likely move the upper top shelf one hole up, 5 stars, but would've been nice if there were more hole covers so it looked complete and pristine. will likely look for something which can do that.
